Prerequisite: Fighter, ranger, or rogue; proficiency with any melee light blade

Benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to Acrobatics checks.

When you are attacking with a melee light blade and you have proficiency with that weapon, you also gain the following benefit.

When you attack an enemy with a power associated with this feat, you can target the enemy's Reflex instead of AC.

Associated Powers:

Dual Strike

,

Gloaming Cut

,

Throw and Stab

Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 120.
